body.p: 1. Prince of Simeon’s tribe who led some Simeonites to the entrance of Gedor to find pasture for their flocks (1 Chr 4:36-39).
2. Ancestor of Maasai, a priest of Israel who was among the first to return to Palestine following the Babylonian captivity (1 Chr 9:12).
3. Ancestor of Azmaveth. Azmaveth was in charge of King David’s treasuries (1 Chr 27:25).
